mapper.select: select * from itGame where gameTitle like concat('%',#{game},'%') or gameSubTitle like concat('%',#{game},'%');

SELECT c.*, timestampdiff(hour, c.cmDate, now()) as hour_diff, timestampdiff(minute, cmDate, now()) as min_diff, m.idx, m.title, m.nickname, m.memImg, g.gameIdx, g.gameTitle FROM itCommunity c JOIN itMember m ON c.mid = m.mid LEFT JOIN itGame g ON c.cmGameIdx = g.gameIdx ORDER BY c.cmIdx desc;
mapper.update: update itGamelist set gamelist=#{gamelist} where glMid=#{mid};
